name: Usher 651
description:
This game was inspired by “The Fall of the House of Usher”, by Edgar Allan Poe. It was published in 1839.  

You will be presented with challenges. If your actions are unsuccessful your peril will increase. The outcome of the game depends on how low your peril is.  

Narrowly missed the Comp deadline. First attempt at a program using Pygame. Very short.

Created for the game jam:  Ludum Dare 49. The theme is ‘Unstable’.

Coded in Python/ Pygame

October 2021

* Feel free to check out other games...

https://fromthechasm.itch.io/

* Any tips on how to get an html file involved, so it can be played in the browser would be greatly appreciated.

Art (and other media) by Lewis Fox

https://www.instagram.com/lewis0fox/
